sentences.en: {"GLOSS":["AIDS at its most advanced stage"],"COLLOINEXA":["full-blown AIDS"]}
AIDS stands for Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome.
sentences.cn: AIDS是获得性免疫缺损综合征的缩写。

sentences.en: Connecticut agreed to end its segregation of prison inmates suffering from AIDS.
sentences.cn: 康涅狄格州同意不再隔离患艾滋病的囚犯。

sentences.en: He had become infected with Aids from an improperly sterilised needle.
sentences.cn: 他因使用消毒不当的注射针头而感染了艾滋病。

sentences.en: He intends to talk to young people about the dangers of AIDS.
sentences.cn: 他打算和青年人谈谈艾滋病的危害。

sentences.en: He promised to appoint an AIDS czar to deal with the disease.
sentences.cn: 他许诺任命一位艾滋病大使来应对这种疾病。

sentences.en: Many areas in the country'sinterior are unable to report Aids cases immediately.
sentences.cn: 该国内地的很多地区无法即时报告艾滋病病例。

sentences.en: She has been talking very explicitly about AIDS to these groups.
sentences.cn: 她一直都在非常坦诚地和这些群体谈论艾滋病问题。

sentences.en: The crash was a direct result of inadequate navigational aids.
sentences.cn: 坠机是导航不力的直接后果。

sentences.en: The hearing-impaired say digital phones interfere with hearing aids.
sentences.cn: 听觉障碍者反映数字电话会对助听器造成干扰。

sentences.en: The interchange of ideas aids an understanding of family dynamics.
sentences.cn: 思想的交流有助于理解家庭动态。

sentences.en: The official number of people carrying the AIDS virus is low.
sentences.cn: 艾滋病病毒携带者的官方数字并不高。

sentences.en: There's a time lag between infection with HIV and developing AIDS.
sentences.cn: 从感染艾滋病病毒到病发有一段滞后期。

sentences.en: They will be helped by the very latest in navigation aids.
sentences.cn: 他们将会受益于最新的导航系统。

sentences.en: This year's budget for AIDS prevention probably won't be much higher.
sentences.cn: 今年用于防治艾滋病的预算很可能不会比往年高很多。

sentences.en: We can now talk openly about AIDS which we couldn't before.
sentences.cn: 现在我们能公开谈论以前讳言不提的艾滋病问题。

trans.tran_cn: 艾滋病，获得性免疫缺乏综合症（Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome）

trans.tran_en: a very serious disease that stops your body from defending itself against infections, and usually causes death

trans.tran_cn: 艾滋病（后天免疫缺损综合症）；（Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome）的缩写
trans.tran_en: AIDS is a disease that destroys the natural system of protection that the body has against other diseases. AIDS is an abbreviation for .
